title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and mix with parmesan.
Toss the spaghetti with pancetta, then add the egg mixture.
Serve with a sprinkle of black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until cooked.
Cook onion, garlic, and tomato puree in a pan.
Add grilled chicken to the pan and simmer.
Serve with rice.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A simple salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with croutons and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing.
Add olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce.
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips and season with salt and pepper.
Cook the beef in a hot pan until browned and set aside.
In the same pan, saut√© onions and mushrooms in butter.
Add flour to the pan and cook for 1 minute.
Add beef broth and stir to combine.
Return the beef to the pan and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.
